class.name: Phaser.ArrayList
class.help: A set data structure. Allows items to add themselves to and remove themselves from the set. Items can only exist once in the set.

public.name: add
public.help: Adds a new element to this list. The item can only exist in the list once.

parameters.name: child
parameters.help: The element to add to this list. Can be a Phaser.Sprite or any other object you need to quickly iterate through.

public.name: callAll
public.help: Calls a function on all members of this list, using the member as the context for the callback.\nThe function must exist on the member.

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.help: Additional parameters that will be passed to the callback.

public.name: exists

returns.help: True if the child is found in the list, otherwise false.

public.help: Checks for the child within this list.

parameters.name: child
parameters.help: The element to get the list index for.

public.name: getIndex

returns.help: The index of the child or -1 if not found.

public.help: Gets the index of the child in the list, or -1 if it isn't in the list.

parameters.name: child
parameters.help: The element to get the list index for.

public.name: remove

returns.help: child - The child that was removed.

public.help: Removes the given element from this list if it exists.

parameters.name: child
parameters.help: The child to be removed from the list.

public.name: reset
public.help: Resets the list length and drops all items in the list.

public.name: setAll
public.help: Sets the property `key` to the given value on all members of this list.

parameters.name: key
parameters.help: The object on the child to set.

parameters.name: value
parameters.help: The value to set the property to.

public.name: first
public.help: Resets the cursor to the first item in the list and returns it.
public.inlineHelp: The first item in the list.

public.name: next
public.help: Gets the next item in the list and returns it, advancing the cursor.

public.name: total
public.inlineHelp: Number of objects in the list.
